hasEntry is part of the Hamcrest library. Here is the signature:

public st=
atic <K, V> org.hamcrest.Matcher<java.util.Map<K, V>> hasEntry(K key, V val=
ue)

I'm curious if you know of a reason that

public static <T> void asser=
tThat(T actual, Matcher<? extends T> matcher)

is wrong. Does it break some=
thing that you know of?
